languauges:
['gugah aku jam sanga esuk dina jumat' 'nyetel weker rong jam seko saiki'
 'olly meneng o' ... 'vui lòng trả lời email tôi vừa đọc'
 'vũ có viết gì cho tôi hôm nay không' 'địa chỉ của tuấn là gì']

['maak my wakker nege-uur v. m. op vrydag'
 "stel 'n alarm vir twee ure van nou af" 'janneman stilte' ...
 'tafadhali jibu barua pepe niliyosoma hivi punde'
 'je juma ameniandikia leo' 'ni anwani gani ya asha']

['væk mig klokken ni fredag' 'sæt en alarm til to timer fra nu'
 'olly stille' ... "ymateb i'r ebost dw'i newydd derbyn"
 'wnaeth bert ysgrifennu ataf i heddiw'
 "beth yw'r cyfeiriad ar gyfer alex"]

['wake me up at nine am on friday' 'set an alarm for two hours from now'
 'olly quiet' ... 'please respond to the email i just read'
 'did bert write me today' "what's the address for alex"]
